items.name: Fulgent Joy
explicitMods: 4% increased Cast Speed with Fire Skills
+14% to Critical Strike Multiplier for Spell Damage
+18% to Critical Strike Multiplier with Fire Skills
fracturedMods: +14% to Critical Strike Multiplier with Elemental Skills
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.

items.name: Armageddon Cut
enchantMods: Added Small Passive Skills grant: 6% increased Mana Reservation Efficiency of Skills
explicitMods: Added Small Passive Skills also grant: +6% to Chaos Resistance
Added Small Passive Skills also grant: +10 to Intelligence
1 Added Passive Skill is Introspection
fracturedMods: Added Small Passive Skills have 35% increased Effect
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Small, Medium or Large Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Added passives do not interact with jewel radiuses. Right click to remove from the Socket.

items.name: Entropy Curio
enchantMods: 1 Added Passive Skill is a Jewel Socket
Added Small Passive Skills grant: 10% increased Damage while affected by a Herald
explicitMods: Added Small Passive Skills also grant: +3 to All Attributes
Added Small Passive Skills also grant: +4 to Strength
1 Added Passive Skill is Heraldry
1 Added Passive Skill is Purposeful Harbinger
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Medium or Large Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Added passives do not interact with jewel radiuses. Right click to remove from the Socket.

items.name: Glyph Shine
enchantMods: 2 Added Passive Skills are Jewel Sockets
Added Small Passive Skills grant: 12% increased Physical Damage
explicitMods: Added Small Passive Skills also grant: +3 to All Attributes
1 Added Passive Skill is Force Multiplier
1 Added Passive Skill is Iron Breaker
1 Added Passive Skill is Master the Fundamentals
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Large Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Added passives do not interact with jewel radiuses. Right click to remove from the Socket.

items.name: Apocalypse Stone
enchantMods: 2 Added Passive Skills are Jewel Sockets
Added Small Passive Skills grant: 12% increased Physical Damage
explicitMods: Added Small Passive Skills also grant: +3% to Chaos Resistance
1 Added Passive Skill is Force Multiplier
1 Added Passive Skill is Iron Breaker
1 Added Passive Skill is Master the Fundamentals
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Large Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Added passives do not interact with jewel radiuses. Right click to remove from the Socket.

items.name: Gale Essence
enchantMods: Added Small Passive Skills grant: 6% increased Mana Reservation Efficiency of Skills
explicitMods: Added Small Passive Skills also grant: +4 to All Attributes
Added Small Passive Skills also grant: +8% to Chaos Resistance
Added Small Passive Skills have 35% increased Effect
1 Added Passive Skill is Introspection
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Small, Medium or Large Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Added passives do not interact with jewel radiuses. Right click to remove from the Socket.

items.name: Watcher's Eye
explicitMods: 6% increased maximum Energy Shield
4% increased maximum Life
5% increased maximum Mana
+1.8% to Critical Strike Chance while affected by Hatred
+33% to Critical Strike Multiplier while affected by Anger
Critical Strikes Penetrate 10% of Enemy Elemental Resistances while affected by Zealotry
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.
flavourText: One by one, they stood their ground against a creature
they had no hope of understanding, let alone defeating,
and one by one, they became a part of it.

items.name: Militant Faith
explicitMods:
Carved to glorify 9381 new faithful converted by High Templar Dominus
Passives in radius are Conquered by the Templars
1% increased effect of Non-Curse Auras per 10 Devotion
4% increased Totem Damage per 10 Devotion
Historic
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.
flavourText: They believed themselves the utmost faithful, but that conviction became oppression.

items.name: The Balance of Terror
explicitMods: +13% to all Elemental Resistances
Gain 40% of Physical Damage as a Random Element if you've cast Elemental Weakness in the past 10 seconds
Immune to Reflected Damage if you've cast Punishment in the past 10 seconds
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.
flavourText: Fellshrine stood as a holy bastion opposite the
Chamber of Sins, and all that it represented.
For one to rise, the other must fall.

items.name: Forbidden Flesh
explicitMods: Allocates Sanctuary of Thought if you have the matching modifier on Forbidden Flame
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.
flavourText: The bodies of those wholly subsumed by the Tangle
continue to merge and mutate and cry out for release...

items.name: Forbidden Flame
explicitMods: Allocates Sanctuary of Thought if you have the matching modifier on Forbidden Flesh
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.
flavourText: The minds of those studied utterly by the Cleansing Fire
continue to think and dream and beg for silence...

Auras from your Skills have 8% increased Effect on you for

228.name: Heraldry
stats: Nearby Enemies have Cold Exposure while you are affected by Herald of Ice
Nearby Enemies have Fire Exposure while you are affected by Herald of Ash
Nearby Enemies have Lightning Exposure while you are affected by Herald of Thunder
reminderText: (Cold Exposure applies -10% to Cold Resistance for 4 seconds)
(Fire Exposure applies -10% to Fire Resistance for 4 seconds)
(Lightning Exposure applies -10% to Lightning Resistance for 4 seconds)
